complexity_levels.basic: Focus on clarity and simplicity, avoid advanced features
complexity_levels.intermediate: Use standard Firebird features, basic optimizations, best practices
complexity_levels.advanced: Explore advanced features, complex optimizations, specialized techniques

operation_guidance.select: Optimize with indexes, use FIRST/SKIP for pagination, consider PLAN for complex queries
operation_guidance.insert: Validate constraints, use explicit transactions, consider RETURNING to get generated ID
operation_guidance.update: Use specific WHERE clauses, consider trigger impact, backup before mass operations
operation_guidance.delete: CAUTION: always use WHERE, consider soft delete, backup mandatory for critical operations
operation_guidance.ddl: Analyze dependencies, use DDL transactions when appropriate, document structural changes
operation_guidance.admin: Focus on security, performance, monitoring and preventive maintenance

query_optimizations.simple: Basic indexes, selectivity, avoid functions in WHERE
query_optimizations.complex: Efficient JOINs, subqueries vs EXISTS, CTEs, window functions
query_optimizations.reporting: Optimized aggregations, composite indexes, materialized views
query_optimizations.oltp: Concurrency, short transactions, unique indexes, prepared statements

focus_techniques.indexes: Selectivity analysis, composite indexes, partial, expression indexes
focus_techniques.joins: JOIN order, JOIN types, supporting indexes
focus_techniques.transactions: Isolation levels, snapshot, read committed, lock resolution
focus_techniques.memory: Page buffers, sort memory, cache hit ratio, garbage collection

architecture_topics.backup: gbak strategies, nbackup, streaming replication, recovery procedures
architecture_topics.security: Users, roles, grants, SSL/TLS, authentication plugins
architecture_topics.monitoring: MON$ tables, trace API, performance counters, alerts
architecture_topics.maintenance: Sweep, garbage collection, rebuild indexes, database repair
